function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clarity and proper guidance in the virtual workforce","Impact":"Decreased productivity and reliable workflow","Mitigation":"Implement clear communication channels and provide proper guidance to the virtual workforce","Technologies":"Digital collaboration tools, virtual meetings, project management software","People":"Virtual workforce, project managers","Owner":"Project managers, team leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of transparency in the construction sector","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to lack of accountability and monitoring","Mitigation":"Enforce transparency regulations, use digital tracking and monitoring systems","Technologies":"Blockchain, IoT sensors, digital documentation systems","People":"Construction workers, government regulators","Owner":"Government regulators, construction companies"},{"Description":"Disruption in work and movement of labor due to economic recession and COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Challenges in recovery for the construction sector, increased risk of contagious disease spread due to labor movement","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans for labor movement, implement safety protocols, invest in automation to reduce reliance on labor","Technologies":"Automation, robotics, AI monitoring, IoT sensors","People":"Construction workers, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"}]}
